statements: SELECT * FROM treatment_plans
SELECT client_id, plan_id FROM treatment_plans WHERE client_id = 1
SELECT plan_id, plan_details FROM treatment_plans WHERE plan_id = 10
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY client_id DESC
SELECT plan_id, plan_details FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY plan_id ASC
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE client_id = 100 ORDER BY plan_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT client_id, plan_details FROM treatment_plans WHERE plan_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY client_id
SELECT client_id, COUNT(plan_id) AS plan_count FROM treatment_plans GROUP BY client_id HAVING plan_count > 1 ORDER BY client_id
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE client_id = 200 OR client_id = 300 ORDER BY client_id, plan_id
SELECT DISTINCT client_id FROM treatment_plans ORDER BY client_id DESC
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM treatment_plans;
SELECT client_name, client_age, client_gender FROM client_details;
SELECT * FROM client_details WHERE client_age > 30;
SELECT client_name, client_gender FROM client_details ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM treatment_plans WHERE treatment_name LIKE '%surgery%';
SELECT client_name, client_age, client_gender FROM client_details WHERE client_age > 30 ORDER BY client_age DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_gender FROM client_details WHERE client_age < 40 AND client_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans JOIN client_details ON treatment_plans.patient_id = client_details.client_id;
SELECT * FROM client_treatment_plans;
SELECT treatment_plan, client_id FROM client_treatment_plans ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, treatment_name FROM appointments JOIN treatments ON appointments.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id;
SELECT client_id, COUNT(*) AS num_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2023-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM client_treatment_plans WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM treatments WHERE treatment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT client_id, COUNT(appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM appointments GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM client_treatment_plans JOIN appointments ON client_treatment_plans.client_id = appointments.client_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentPlan;
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE treatment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_name, client_age, client_gender FROM Client WHERE client_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialization FROM Therapist ORDER BY therapist_name DESC;

SELECT client_name, therapist_name, treatment_status FROM Client JOIN TreatmentHistory ON Client.client_id = TreatmentHistory.client_id JOIN Therapist ON TreatmentHistory.therapist_id = Therapist.therapist_id;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentPlan;
SELECT client_name, client_age, client_gender FROM Client WHERE client_age > 30 ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialization FROM Therapist WHERE therapist_specialization = 'Counseling';
SELECT treatment_name, treatment_description, treatment_date FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE treatment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;

SELECT th.*, c.client_name, t.therapist_name FROM TreatmentHistory th JOIN Client c ON th.client_id = c.client_id JOIN Therapist t ON th.therapist_id = t.therapist_id WHERE treatment_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM Client;
SELECT client_name, client_age, client_gender FROM Client WHERE client_age > 30;
SELECT plan_description, start_date, end_date FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT task_description, due_date, status FROM TreatmentTask ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT goal_description, target_date, completed FROM TreatmentGoal WHERE completed = true;
SELECT * FROM Client ORDER BY client_age DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_age, client_gender FROM Client WHERE client_gender='Male';
SELECT plan_id, plan_description, start_date FROM TreatmentPlan WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, task_description, status FROM TreatmentTask JOIN TreatmentPlan ON TreatmentTask.plan_id = TreatmentPlan.plan_id WHERE TreatmentPlan.client_id = 1;
SELECT goal_id, goal_description, target_date FROM TreatmentGoal WHERE completed = True ORDER BY target_date ASC;
